channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: U.S. Steel shares drop as Trump echoes Biden in opposing sale to Nippon
25,000 strangers united to find a missing photographer after cryptic texts and a missed flight—now police say she chose to vanish
item.description: Kobayashi went missing after the budding photographer from Maui didn’t make a connecting flight to New York on Nov. 8 to travel for a new job and to v...

item.title: U.S. job openings increase. And more quitting is a sign of an improving economy.
South Korea ETFs drop sharply after martial-law declaration — live coverage
Super Micro whistleblower doubles down on claim he was fired for complaining about accounting practices at the $20 billion tech giant
item.description: The company has denied allegations of improprieties and given its accounting a clean bill of health.

item.title: Lost track of a 401(k)? This new federal database can help you track it down.
South Korea’s president, describing opposition as ‘anti-state forces’, declares martial law
item.description: President Yoon Suk Yeol said the step was necessary to protect the country from "communist forces" amid parliamentary wrangling over a budget bill.

item.title: The Great Pause for hiring frustrates 3 in 4 weary job seekers: ‘Like throwing a resume into a black box’
item.description: Job seekers go a year without an interview, navigating a cold hiring market

item.title: Talks of Donald Trump Jr. joining the board of a little-known company minutes away from Mar-a-Lago just doubled its stock price
item.description: Trump Jr. could reportedly join the board as early as Tuesday.

item.title: 4 life and investing lessons from NYSE icon Art Cashin, dead at 83
